info.title: Account API
info.description: API for registering an alias for a bank account

put.summary: Update the alias for a bank account
put.description: Updates the alias for a bank account with the given ID

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the bank account to update

200.description: Successful update of the alias for the bank account

404.description: The bank account with the given ID was not found

alias_type.description: The type of alias to use. Valid values are 'email', 'phone', or 'random'

alias_value.description: The value to use for the alias. The format depends on the alias type selected. For email, this should be a valid email address. For phone, this should be a valid phone number. For random, this value is ignored.
